desc: One of a kind, limited line, handcrafted jewellery. Kimberly Kropf Jewellery Designs is located in the growing KW region (Kitchener-Waterloo) With a focus on small batch production, each piece is made entirely by Kimberly. From raw materials including sterling silver, gold and gemstones to the finished pieces here.

layout.text: One of a Kind, Limited Line
Each piece is designed, crafted and finished by Kimberly Kropf in Kitchener, ON
